name: GoMacro Peanut Butter Protein Bar
description: A peanut lovers dream, loaded with creamy peanut butter, crunchy roasted peanuts and sweet peanut chips, this blend of salty-sweet hits all the right notes. This Protein Replenishment bar is packed with 12g of plant-based protein.Ingredients: organic brown rice syrup, organic peanut butter, organic sprouted brown rice protein, organic peanut butter chips (organic peanut flour, organic coconut sugar, organic cocoa butter, salt), organic puffed brown rice, organic peanuts.Manufactured in a facility that processes peanuts and other nuts.May contain pit or nutshell fragments.
